Package model

Class RoomList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.RoomList
  • public class RoomList
extends java.lang.Object
    The class stores an array list of all existing rooms as well as a few method that will help interact with said rooms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RoomList()
      One-argument constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addRoom​(Room room)
      The method is meant to add a new room to the existing room list.
      boolean contains​(Room room)
      method is meant to check if given room is part of a created room array list.
      RoomList copy()
      method copying the current RoomList into a new RoomList
      int getNumberOfRooms()
      method is meant to get the amount of room object are stored in the room array list.
      Room getRoom​(int index)
      method is meant to find a room from the room array list by room's index.
      Room getRoomByRoomNumber​(java.lang.String roomNumber)
      method intended to get a room object stored in the array list by room's number.
      void removeRoom​(int index)
      The method is meant to remove a room from the existing room list by the rooms index.
      java.lang.String toString()
      method is meant to print out the room array list in a readable manner.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomList

        public RoomList()
        One-argument constructor. In the constructor we initialize the instance variable as a new array list that will store a list of rooms.

    • Method Detail

      • addRoom

        public void addRoom​(Room room)
        The method is meant to add a new room to the existing room list.
        Parameters:
        room - the room that needs to be added to the array list.

      • removeRoom

        public void removeRoom​(int index)
        The method is meant to remove a room from the existing room list by the rooms index.
        Parameters:
        index - the position in the room array list of the room that needs to be removed.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom​(int index)
        method is meant to find a room from the room array list by room's index. In the method if-statement is used to check if the array list is larger or equal to the given index to make sure that the index is correct. Otherwise, it will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        index - position in the array list of the room that we need to find.
        Returns:
        the room with specified index (position in an array list).

      • getRoomByRoomNumber

        public Room getRoomByRoomNumber​(java.lang.String roomNumber)
        method intended to get a room object stored in the array list by room's number. In the method for-loop is used to loop through all the objects in the array list and an if-statement to compare the given room number with the ones in the list. If it is not found it will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - room number according to which the room has to found.
        Returns:
        room by specified room number.

      • getNumberOfRooms

        public int getNumberOfRooms()
        method is meant to get the amount of room object are stored in the room array list.
        Returns:
        number of room object in the room array list.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(Room room)
        method is meant to check if given room is part of a created room array list.
        Parameters:
        room - the room that is checked if it's part of the array list.
        Returns:
        boolean (true of false), if contains - true, else - false.

      • copy

        public RoomList copy()
        method copying the current RoomList into a new RoomList
        Returns:
        a copy of the current RoomList

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        method is meant to print out the room array list in a readable manner. a new s string variable is created to store the list of rooms. for-loop is used to go through all the items in an array list and store it into the s string each in a different line.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        s variable with a list of rooms.
